relatedNodes.html: PROFESSIONAL DIGITAL SIGNAGE SOFTWARE PIONEER AND GLOBAL INDUSTRY LEADER
Navori Labs Launches QL Access Control
Navori Labs Wins Two Awards for Digital Signage Software Innovation

Digital signage is a centrally controlled content management and distribution platform generally used for communication and advertising. Digital signs are a great way to communicate more effectively, improve the customer experience, and drive more revenue.
DIGITAL SIGNAGE CMS for desktop or mobile
Navori QL lets you push content to any number of screens powered from an external media player or system-on-chip (SOC) architecture. Navori QL offers the following benefits:
Build eye-catching templates using QL Designer
Plays any content with no conversion
Social media feeds, XML, RSS and calendar events - all without any programming
Multi-user with view, role and content approval
linked to user profiles (i.e. creative, administrative, technical, etc.)
based on a display's location, or use tags, validity and data-driven playback rules
Publish and control from web browser and mobile
from anywhere, across multiple displays, regardless of platform
Non-desk employees get real-time digital signage control
to respond to any business situation
with content editing capabilities on one or multiple players, all from a smartphone or tablet
Equip your teams with ideal tools
for instant messaging, sales assistance and real-time publishing
TAKE ON ANY CHALLENGE WITH NAVORI QL PLAYER!
One professional software for all digital signage display brands and screen layouts
on all platforms including mobile devices, tablets, SoC displays and external media players.
QL Player for Windows supports up to 8K
In a multi-screen layout with the Navori QL Insane Performance Rendering (IPR) player add-on.

REGULATE TRAFFIC IN PUBLIC SPACES with
QL Access control
PROTECT YOUR VISITOR’S HEALTH – SAFEGUARD YOUR BUSINESS
New QL 2.2.5 version – QL Access Control add-on
Manages traffic to guarantee social distances​
Mask detection for customers and the public
Customize content and scenario with QL Designer​
Flexible: Access Control and Digital Signage​
